logic

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Services

  • public class Services
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains services for creating a short url and to get long url and statistics from the database Created by Giuseppe Perniola on 26/02/2016.

    • Method Detail

      • setShortURL

        public static java.lang.String setShortURL(java.lang.String longURL,
                                           java.lang.String customURL,
                                           java.lang.String ip,
                                           java.lang.String userAgent)
                                    throws CustomUrlUnavailableException,
                                           MaxAttemptsException,
                                           BlankUrlException,
                                           BadWordException
        This function finds if there is already a short url associated to the long url taken in input, if there isnt, then calculates a new short url and gives it in output as a json string. Uses the custom url as a short url if is provided.
        Parameters:
        longURL - the long url from which calculate the short url
        customURL - an optional string which contains a custom url to memorize as the short url associated to the long url
        ip - the ip of the client that requested the short url
        userAgent - the user agent of the client that requested the short url
        Returns:
        a json string containing the short url associated to the long url
        Throws:
        CustomUrlUnavailableException - thrown if the custom url is already present in the db
        MaxAttemptsException - thrown if is not possible to create a short url from the hash function
        BlankUrlException - thrown if the long url needed to create the short url is empty
        BadWordException - thrown if a custom url contains a forbidden word

      • redirectURL

        public static java.lang.String redirectURL(java.lang.String shortURL,
                                           java.lang.String ip,
                                           java.lang.String userAgent)
                                    throws UrlNotPresentException,
                                           EmptyClicksException
        Given a short url this function finds and returns, as a json string, the long url or the statistics associated to it
        Parameters:
        shortURL - the short url needed to find the long url or the statistics associated
        ip - the ip of the client requesting the long url
        userAgent - the user agent of the client requesting the long url
        Returns:
        returns a json string containing the list of statistics or the long url
        Throws:
        UrlNotPresentException - thrown if the short url is not present in the db
        EmptyClicksException - thrown if the list of Clicks retrieved from the db is empty

      • DBisPopulated

        public static boolean DBisPopulated()
        Checks if the db is already populated by the populator
        Returns:
        true if the db is populated, false otherwise

      • setDBisPopulated

        public static java.lang.Integer setDBisPopulated()
        Sets the db as already populated by the populator
        Returns:
        1 if the set was successful, 0 otherwise

      • deleteURL

        public static void deleteURL(java.lang.String url)
        deletes the url from the db (the key associated to the long url and the key associated to the list of clicks)
        Parameters:
        url - the short url to delete
